subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It is only summer league, but the Knicks are 2-0 and youngsters like Renaldo Balkman and Demetris Nichols are making Isiah Thomas, the coach and president, look good and feel good.
snippet: It is only summer league, but the Knicks are 2-0 and youngsters like Renaldo Balkman and Demetris Nichols are making Isiah Thomas, the coach and president, look good and feel good.
